summary: "Gravity" is a 2013 sci-fi thriller directed by Alfonso Cuarón. It stars Sandra Bullock and George Clooney as astronauts trying to get back to Earth after their space shuttle is destroyed. The film was mostly made in the UK with impressive visual effects. It opened to critical acclaim and was one of the top-grossing films of the year. Cuarón won Best Director at the Oscars, Golden Globes, and BAFTA awards. The movie is considered one of the best of the 2010s.
title: Gravity (2013 film)
